SEARCH
Package edu.aau.g404.device.light

Interface SmartLight

All Superinterfaces:
SmartDevice
All Known Implementing Classes:
HueLight, WiZLight
public interface SmartLight extends SmartDevice
SmartLight is an interface representing a specific type of SmartDevice: a smart light. Classes that implement this interface should model the behavior and properties of smart lights. SmartLight extends the SmartDevice interface and adds methods for controlling the light's state.

  • Method Details

    • isOn

      SmartLight isOn(boolean bool)
      Sets the on/off state of the SmartLight.
      Parameters:
      bool - True if the light should be turned on, false if it should be turned off.
      Returns:
      The SmartLight instance with the updated on/off state.

    • setBrightness

      SmartLight setBrightness(float brightness)
      Sets the brightness of the SmartLight.
      Parameters:
      brightness - Brightness value between 0 and 1, representing the desired brightness level.
      Returns:
      The SmartLight instance with the updated brightness level.

    • setColor

      SmartLight setColor(int red, int green, int blue)
      Sets the color of the SmartLight using RGB values.
      Parameters:
      red - Red an integer between 0 and 255.
      green - Green an integer between 0 and 255.
      blue - Blue an integer between 0 and 255.
      Returns:
      The SmartLight instance with the updated color.
